typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CNPJ as string,
		GRI as string,
		REP as string,
		{RAZAO SOCIAL} as string,
		ENDERECO as string,
		BAIRRO as string,
		CIDADE as string,
		UF as string,
		STATUS as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	format: 'excel',
	fileSystem: 'gsksynapsestorage',
	folderPath: 'synapse/workspaces/gsk-synapse/warehouse/aux.tabelas_auxiliares',
	fileName: 'CNPJS TOP INDEPENDENTES - RI.xlsx',
	sheetName: 'LISTA CNPJs',
	firstRowAsHeader: true) ~> DimTopIndependentes
source(output(
		CICLO_TERRITORIO_CONTATO as string,
		PAINEL_CICLO as string,
		PAINEL_CICLO_ATUAL as string,
		PAINEL_ROW_ID_TERRITORIO as string,
		CICLO_TERRITORIO_DIVISAO as string,
		DOCUMENTO as string,
		BRICK as string,
		MEDICO as string,
		DOC_NAME as string,
		GRUPOPROMOCIONAL as string,
		ESPECIALIDADE as string,
		TIPOCONTATO as string,
		COMPLEMENTO as string,
		CEP as string,
		LOGRADOURO as string,
		BAIRRO as string,
		CIDADE as string,
		UF as string,
		EMAIL_1_1 as string,
		EMAIL_MASS as string,
		TELEFONEMEDICO as string,
		CELULARMEDICO as string,
		ULTALTCONTATO as string,
		UFDOCUMENTO as string,
		NUMERODOCUMENTO as string,
		PAINEL_ROW_ID_CONTATO as string,
		PAINEL_ROW_ID_GRUPOPROMOCIONAL as string,
		PAINEL_ROW_ID_DIVISAO as string,
		PAINEL_ROW_ID_FUNCIONARIO as string,
		PAINEL_DIVISAO as string,
		PERSON_UID as string,
		ORIGEM_DADOS as string,
		DATA_CARGA as string,
		PAINEL_STATUS as string,
		TIPO as string,
		BRICK_NOME as string,
		SITUACAO as string,
		FLG_OFICIAL_GOVERNO as string,
		ESPECIALIDADE_02 as string,
		ESPECIALIDADE_03 as string,
		ROW_ID_ENDERECO as string,
		CPF as string,
		ORIGEM_END as string,
		NETWORKID as string,
		DOCUMENTO_VEEVA as string,
		FLG_MEDICO_AUDIT as string,
		ESPEC_CYCLE_PLAN as string,
		STATUS_MEDICO as string,
		EMAIL_1_1_CONSENT as string,
		EMAIL_MASS_CONSENT as string,
		COMENTARIO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['synapse/workspaces/gsk-synapse/warehouse/dash.kpi_visitacao/dim_painel_medico.parquet']) ~> DimPainelMedico
DimTopIndependentes derive(TOP_IND_FLAG = 'S') ~> CriandoColunaTopIndFlag
CriandoColunaTopIndFlag select(mapColumn(
		DOCUMENTO = CNPJ,
		TOP_IND_FLAG
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ChavemamentoTopIndependente
DimPainelMedico, ChavemamentoTopIndependente join(DimPainelMedico@DOCUMENTO == ChavemamentoTopIndependente@DOCUMENTO,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LeftJoinPainelMedTopIndependente
LeftJoinPainelMedTopIndependente derive(TOP_IND_FLAG = case(isNull(TOP_IND_FLAG),'N',TOP_IND_FLAG)) ~> CondicaoTopIndFlag
CondicaoTopIndFlag select(mapColumn(
		CICLO_TERRITORIO_CONTATO,
		PAINEL_CICLO,
		PAINEL_CICLO_ATUAL,
		PAINEL_ROW_ID_TERRITORIO,
		CICLO_TERRITORIO_DIVISAO,
		DOCUMENTO = DimPainelMedico@DOCUMENTO,
		BRICK,
		MEDICO,
		DOC_NAME,
		GRUPOPROMOCIONAL,
		ESPECIALIDADE,
		TIPOCONTATO,
		COMPLEMENTO,
		CEP,
		LOGRADOURO,
		BAIRRO,
		CIDADE,
		UF,
		EMAIL_1_1,
		EMAIL_MASS,
		TELEFONEMEDICO,
		CELULARMEDICO,
		ULTALTCONTATO,
		UFDOCUMENTO,
		NUMERODOCUMENTO,
		PAINEL_ROW_ID_CONTATO,
		PAINEL_ROW_ID_GRUPOPROMOCIONAL,
		PAINEL_ROW_ID_DIVISAO,
		PAINEL_ROW_ID_FUNCIONARIO,
		PAINEL_DIVISAO,
		PERSON_UID,
		ORIGEM_DADOS,
		DATA_CARGA,
		PAINEL_STATUS,
		TIPO,
		BRICK_NOME,
		SITUACAO,
		FLG_OFICIAL_GOVERNO,
		ESPECIALIDADE_02,
		ESPECIALIDADE_03,
		ROW_ID_ENDERECO,
		CPF,
		ORIGEM_END,
		NETWORKID,
		DOCUMENTO_VEEVA,
		FLG_MEDICO_AUDIT,
		ESPEC_CYCLE_PLAN,
		STATUS_MEDICO,
		EMAIL_1_1_CONSENT,
		EMAIL_MASS_CONSENT,
		COMENTARIO,
		DOCUMENTO = DimPainelMedico@DOCUMENTO,
		TOP_IND_FLAG
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelecaoFinal
SelecaoFinal sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	filePattern:'dimensao_painel_medico[n].parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkDimPainelMedico
